pageProduct.name: SUP Clear Skin 30 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Get rid of toxins that cause breakouts, relieve symptoms of acne and support skin health.

CONFIDENCE LEVEL: NO FILTER
Clear skin doesn't end at good skincare. Burdock has been traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine (WHM) to relieve symptoms of mild acne and mild eczema due to its blood purifying and cleansing properties. Vitamin A is your ingestible retinol to maintain skin health. Zinc is renowned for supporting skin healing. Plus Turmeric for its anti-inflammatory actions.

WHY POP SUP?
SUP Clear Skin combines skin clarifying Burdock, Vitamin C, Vitamin A and Zincplus Turmeric.

- Burdock traditionally used in WHM as a blood cleanser to relieve symptoms of mild acne
- Vitamin A to maintain skin health
- Vitamin C helps reduce free radical damage to body cells
- Zinc to support skin health and healing POPSUP

Size: 30 Capsules

KEY FEATURES

• Burdock traditionally used in WHM as a blood cleanser to relieve symptoms of mild acne
• Vitamin A to maintain skin health
• Vitamin C helps reduce free radical damage to body cells
• Zinc to support skin health and healing

Warnings

The recommended daily amount of Vitamin A from all sources is 700 micrograms retinol equivalents for women and 900 micrograms retinol equivalents for men. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Do not use if tamper-evident seal is broken or missing. Reseal immediately after use.

Ingredients

Zinc citrate dihydrate 37.38mg
Equiv. to Zinc 12mg
Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 100mg
Retinol acetate 860 mcg
Equiv. to Vitamin A 750 mcg RE
Curcuma longa (Turmeric) rhizome ext. dry conc 50mg
Equiv. to rhizome dry 1g
Arctium lappa (Greater burdock) root ext. dry conc 300mg
Equiv. to root dry 1.5g

Allergen Free From: Gluten

Directions

If you are pregnant - or considering becoming pregnant - do not take Vitamin A supplements without consulting your doctor. When taken in excess of 3000 micrograms retinol equivalents - Vitamin A can cause birth defects.

Take 1 capsule daily with food, or as directed by your health professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C
